name: Thumbnail Group
description: Displays a small group of two or more images retrieved from the user's gallery. This is used to show a collection of related photos (up to 3) in a single component.
examples: Show me the best photos from my trip.
Show me pictures of the sky.
Find my favorite photos from last summer.

component_title.description: A brief title for the entire image group (e.g., 'Trip Photos', 'Highlights').

date.description: A relevant date or date range for the group of images (e.g., 'August 2023', 'Jan - Sep 2025').

thumbnail_list.description: An array containing the paths to the images to be displayed. Recommended 2-3 items.

thumbnail_img.description: The path to an individual image in the group.

place.description: The place associated with the image. Please avoid `unknown` words. Just use the place or city name.

date.description: The date associated with the image. The date should be different for each image. Please avoid `unknown` words. Just use the date.

html:
{{ data.date }}

{{ data.component_title }}
